original_title: Kim Jong Un calls for rapid nuclear arsenal expansion amid US drills | Fox News
article_summary: North Korea's leader, Kim Jong Un, has called for the rapid expansion of North Korea's nuclear arsenal in response to U.S.-South Korea military exercises. This comes as South Korea plans to reduce tensions with North Korea, following the collapse of a 2018 military agreement between the two countries. The rise in tensions could have potential implications for China and North Korea if the Russia-Ukraine war ends.</s>
